Policies and Procedures
Course Cancellation Policy
The university reserves the right to cancel any course due to little or no enrollment at any given time before a semester starts or for other reasons deemed necessary. Students will be notified at their university hawk.iit.edu email address that a course is cancelled. No charge will be made for students registered in a course that is being cancelled as university administration will drop the course for the particular set of students.
